summary: Replaces the White Horse texture from the light horse breed mod with a more realistic, fleabitten grey looking.
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod to make the horses more realistic and more characteristic than the old textures let them look like . I want the Horses like they are, wild, strong and beautiful.  

This is my first retexture and my first upload on Nexus, if you have enought time i\\\'m looking forward to hear from you wether it works.

If i have enought time, i will make more retextures. You can send me requests if you want to.

To install this Texture you only need to install it with NMM. To install it manual just replace the horse02.dds file in steam/steamApps/commom/skyrim/textures/actors/horse with the new file.




Swift Steeds New Light Breed Horses Replacer by FieryMarigold is required for this mod to work correctly. Thanks for this awesome new meshes!l

ink to the mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34940/
author: Valachhim
